definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Sharks cruised toward her lone figure, only to be driven away by rifle shots.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼游向她孤单的身躯，只能靠来复枪来击退。

sentences.english: Fett's armor and body were extremely battered by his ordeal in the Sarlacc.
sentences.chinese: 在沙拉克中的煎熬使费特的盔甲和身躯都饱受摧残。

sentences.english: He heaved his huge bulk out of the chair.
sentences.chinese: 他挺起巨大的身躯，从椅子上站了起来。

sentences.english: A little body often harbours a great soul.
sentences.chinese: 莫道身躯小，圣人寓其间。

sentences.english: I never let my valiant wings off your soft and fairy body.
sentences.chinese: 我永远不会让强健的翅膀与你柔软轻灵的身躯分离。

sentences.english: A little body often harbours a great soul.
sentences.chinese: 伟大的灵魂常寓于矮小的身躯。

sentences.english: The underline of the rib cage curves gradually into a moderate tuck-up.
sentences.chinese: 胸腔底部呈优美的曲线，向身躯后方适度上提。

sentences.english: Withers pronounced and forming the highest point of the body.
sentences.chinese: 马肩隆明显，是身躯的最高点。

sentences.english: He overweights himself with huge muscles.
sentences.chinese: 他肥胖的身躯令他行动不便。

sentences.english: Body -Short-coupled and sturdy with no waist or tuck-up.
sentences.chinese: 身躯短而结实，没有细腰或收腹。

sentences.english: They wear hideous clothes to cover their mostly monstrous bodies.
sentences.chinese: 他们穿着丑陋的衣服以便掩盖畸形的身躯。

sentences.english: The athlete has a powerful trunk.
sentences.chinese: 那个运动员身躯强壮有力。

sentences.english: I have a large body with wrinkled skin and tusks made out of ivory.
sentences.chinese: 我有一个满是褶皱皮肤的庞大身躯和尖尖的象牙。

sentences.english: Those who having dinosaurian body is medium grain is in its local the muscle that showed aardwolf.
sentences.chinese: 有着恐龙身躯的中粮在它的局部显出了土狼的肌肉。

sentences.english: Elbows are set close to the body and turn neither in nor out.
sentences.chinese: 肘部贴近身躯，既不向内弯，也不向外翻。

definition: human shape/in human form/of human appearance/doll/puppet
the four limbs of the body
